WorkItem.Description:
When I have already many apps installed the installation of additional apps sometimes fails without any error message.
![Install app fails](https://i.imgur.com/ZVznGtt.gif)

FYI MB is wrong, of course the file is only 36 KB large.
This is what I tried to install: http://www.ticalc.org/archives/files/fileinfo/277/27719.html

Wabbitemu 1.9.5.20 x64
Windows 7 x64

Comments.Message: Okay, maybe the file is too large, but in this case it should at least show an error message - whcih I already saw, but which is not shown in this example.
